42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ash-Sha bi that; "Adiyy bin Hatim who was neighbor, Dakhilan and Rabitan at An-Nahrain narrated that he asked the Prophet Saying:'I releaser my dog and I find another dog with my dog, and I do not know which of them caught (the game).' He said: 'Do not eat, for your only said the name of Allah over your dog, and not over any other dog

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا وَجَدَ مَعَ كَلْبِهِ كَلْبًا غَيْرَهُ
chapter.eng-name: If He Finds Another Dog With His Dog
